Room.Name: Lyanden Road
Room.ShortDescription: The Lyanden Road follows the northern boundary of the immense K'tral Desert.
Room.LongDescription: The desert actually forms a buffer with the badlands farther south. Entire caravans have beeen lost in the K'tral, but it is a faster route between Brownhaven and Oceancrest. However, no one has ever been known to enter the badlands and return, except a few raving lunatics.
